Html:
Hi,

I am just wondering if it is possible to use this library to extract Tasks, Announcements, Team Discussions ...etc from SharePoint ?

I noticed that the framework will generate C# classes for the lists that I create myself on SharePoint ..but it will not generate classes for Tasks or Calendar for example .

if this is possible how to query Tasks ?



Thanks

I guess I figured it out, selecting all lists in the wizard will not generated classes ..but If I select only one list like (Tasks) , I will get the classes generated ..

this framework is really great.

It seems that for some reason selecting a list that consist of two words (space between them) like "Shared Documents" or "Team Discussions" will not work !!

classes are not generated for these list ? any help ?

 

Thanks
